thread.title: Raven Huntley

author: Raven Huntley
title: Raven Huntley
text: So I'm a little crazy and to get the promotions like free shipping and the half all sale you have to enter a promo code but I didn't know that so they actually called me and did it for me and refunded me my extra money they are amazing that was the best customer service ever üòçüòçüòçand being that I work in the medical field I take customer service very seriously thank you for being so amazing
